text: Ladies in Love is a 1936 American romantic comedy movie directed by Edward H. Griffith and based on the play of the same name by Leslie Bush-Fekete. It stars Janet Gaynor, Constance Bennett, Loretta Young, Simone Simon, Don Ameche, Paul Lukas, Tyrone Power, Virginia Field and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1936 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Edward H. Griffith
title: Ladies in Love
